title: 📊 Market Intel — Feb 18, 2026 @ 8:02 PM ET
content:
# 📊 Market Intel — February 18, 2026 @ 8:02 PM ET

**Bitcoin plunges to $66K amid Fed rate hike fears • Crypto regulatory battles intensify • OpenAI tests AI for smart contract security • Tech stocks rebound after AI sell-off • Olympics dominate sports headlines**

---

## 🔥 **Top Trending**

- **Bitcoin sinks to $66,000** as Fed minutes mention possible rate hike — 5th consecutive weekly decline (CoinDesk)
- **Fed hawkish signals** rattle markets — potential rate hikes back on table, stocks lose steam
- **Crypto regulation heats up**: Banking trade groups blocking market structure bill, says Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong
- **Base moves away from Optimism's OP stack** in major tech shift — OP token falls (CoinDesk)
- **Ethereum 50% staking milestone** triggers backlash over "misleading" supply data

---

## 📈 **Stock Movers**

### Indices
- **Market volatility** as Fed minutes spook investors
- **U.S. stocks falling behind** international markets — potential shift toward global equities emerging
- **Crypto stocks bounce** amid cooling AI fears: Coinbase, Circle, Galaxy, IREN, Riot rebound

### Notable Tickers
- **Riot Platforms (RIOT)** +9% — Activist investor Starboard urges AI data center expansion at Texas sites with 1.7 GW power capacity
- **Optimism (OP)** — Falls after Coinbase's Base abandons OP stack
- **Bitcoin miners pivoting to AI** — Utilizing excess power infrastructure for data centers

### Sector Moves
- **Crypto-related stocks rebounding** after recent AI-driven sell-off
- **Software sector finds relief** after brutal week

---

## 💰 **Crypto & Digital Assets**

### Bitcoin & Ethereum
- **BTC**: $66,000 (down, 5th weekly decline)
- **ETH**: 50% staking milestone — but data accuracy questioned, actual staked supply closer to 30%

### Trending Coins (CoinGecko)
1. **PENGU** (Pudgy Penguins) — Rank #105
2. **ESP** (Espresso) — Rank #475
3. **SOL** (Solana) — Rank #7 (trending searches)
4. **HYPE** (Hyperliquid) — Rank #16
5. **ADA** (Cardano) — Rank #13

### Top Crypto News
- **Real estate billionaire Barry Sternlicht** ready to tokenize $125B in assets but blocked by U.S. regulation
- **Kraken acquires token management firm Magna** ahead of IPO push
- **Zora moves to Solana** — major protocol migration
- **World Liberty Financial (Trump-affiliated)** partners with $3.5T asset manager Apex Group to pilot USD1 stablecoin for tokenized funds
- **Bitwise files for prediction market ETFs** for 2026 and 2028 U.S. elections
- **NYSE to launch 24/7 tokenized asset trading** later this year
- **Hyperliquid starts DeFi lobbying group** with $29M token backing
- **Arthur Hayes predicts**: AI crisis will trigger credit defaults, massive Fed response will drive BTC to new highs

---

## 🔵 **Bloomberg**

- Site blocked by bot detection (unable to fetch)

---

## 🟠 **Hacker News** (Top Stories)

1. **Ladybird browser drops Swift adoption** (129 pts) — Browser project reverses course on Swift integration
2. **Women's clothing sizing chaos** (238 pts) — Data visualization of inconsistent sizing standards
3. **27-year-old Apple iBooks can still connect to Wi-Fi** and download updates (117 pts)
4. **Cosmologically Unique IDs** (268 pts) — New UUID approach for distributed systems
5. **Zero-day CSS vulnerability CVE-2026-2441** (245 pts) — Actively exploited Chrome bug patched

---

## 🐦 **X/Twitter Sentiment**

- **$SPY**, **$NVDA**, **$TSLA** trending amid market volatility
- Fed rate hike fears dominating FinTwit discussion
- Unusual activity alerts from @unusual_whales, @DeItaone likely focused on crypto liquidations and Fed positioning
- Bitcoin community debating whether $66K is a buy-the-dip opportunity or start of deeper correction

---

## 🦍 **Reddit / WSB**

- WSB subreddit rules page fetched (no specific trending plays visible in scrape)
- r/stocks discussion minimal in fetch
- **Community focus**: Likely on volatility plays, Fed reaction trades, and crypto miner pivot to AI

---

## 🚀 **Tesla / SpaceX / Elon**

- Tesla.com/news blocked (403 error)
- No major Elon/Tesla/SpaceX headlines surfaced today

---

## 💻 **AI & Tech**

### OpenAI
- **OpenAI unveils 'EVMbench'** (with Paradigm) — Tool to test if AI can keep crypto smart contracts safe
- **OpenAI hires Instagram's VP of global partnerships** Charles Porch as first VP of global creative partnerships

### Meta
- **Meta spending $65M on elections** to sway AI legislation via pro-AI super PACs ("Forge the Future Project" for Republicans, "Making Our Tomorrow" for Democrats)
- **Mark Zuckerberg testifies in LA court** on Instagram safety

### Other AI/Tech
- **Epic Games acquires Meshcapade** — AI tech for animating digital humans, will integrate into Unreal Engine MetaHumans
- **Google Chrome zero-day** CVE-2026-2441 patched — actively exploited CSS vulnerability
- **ByteDance AI theft accusation**: Netflix threatens "immediate litigation" over Seedance AI generating unauthorized Stranger Things, Squid Game, Bridgerton content
- **YouTube outage** resolved — recommendations system failure knocked service down briefly Tuesday night
- **Amazon shelves Blue Jay robotics system** — Prioritizing smaller same-day delivery warehouses over large automation
- **eBay buying Depop from Etsy** for ~$1.2B to win Gen Z with social fashion marketplace
- **Mozilla ending Firefox support** for Windows 7 & 8
- **Snapchat hits 25M paid subscribers** — 71% YoY growth, $1B annual revenue run rate

---

## 🏈 **Sports & Betting**

### Olympics (Milan Cortina 2026)
- **U.S. men's hockey survives OT thriller** vs Sweden, advances to semifinals vs Slovakia
- **Mikaela Shiffrin wins giant slalom gold**
- **Team USA's Hilary Knight & Brittany Bowe get engaged** in Milan

### Other Sports
- **MLB**: Bruce Meyer elected MLBPA executive director to replace Tony Clark after scandal
- **NBA**: Kings' Sabonis and LaVine out for season with surgeries; LaMelo Ball uninjured after car crash
- **NFL**: Paul Allen estate begins process of selling Seahawks; civil suit filed vs Chiefs' Rashee Rice alleging assault
- **MMA**: Ronda Rousey vs Gina Carano fight set — extensive testing underway

---

## 💎 **Commodities & Macro**

- **Fed Minutes**: Possible rate hike mentioned — hawkish tone spooks markets
- **Treasury yields** likely rising on rate hike speculation
- **Gold, Oil**: No specific updates captured
- **Market positioning**: Defensive as investors reassess rate path

---

## 📌 **Key Takeaways**

1. **Bitcoin's $66K level critical** — Break below could trigger fresh leg lower
2. **Regulatory battles intensifying** — Banking lobby blocking crypto legislation, Trump admin attacking EPA climate rules
3. **AI infrastructure boom** — Bitcoin miners pivoting, Meta pushing legislative agenda, OpenAI expanding partnerships
4. **Tokenization accelerating** — Despite regulatory hurdles, real estate, prediction markets, and traditional finance moving on-chain
5. **Fed remains wildcard** — Rate hike possibility back in play, markets repricing risk

---

**Sources**: Yahoo Finance, Reuters, CoinDesk, MarketWatch, Hacker News, ESPN, Reddit (WSB, r/stocks, r/cryptocurrency), TechCrunch, The Verge, CoinGecko API

**Next scan**: 2 hours
